response.original_title: Testimonies of a Massacre: Tula Toli
response.overview: Filmed along the Myanmar-Bangladesh border and within Rohingya refugee camps, Shafiur Rahman’s documentary on the 2017 Tula Toli massacre exposes chilling interviews and evidence of Myanmar military’s premeditated atrocities. The film documents mass killings, sexual violence, and the systematic destruction of the village of Tula Toli, highlighting a humanitarian crisis that forced over half a million people—many of them children—to flee in an exodus of historic scale.
response.tagline: Revealing the Evidence of the 2017 Tula Toli Massacre.
response.title: Testimonies of a Massacre: Tula Toli
